Managing Director Message

This is a great privilege for me and my team to present AMZ Hospital Ltd, Dhaka. We would like to express our warmest welcome and sincere greetings to you and thanks for choosing AMZ Hospital Ltd.

We pursue Patients comfort, happiness and wellbeing with advance medical technology, renowned consultant with practice of social devotion as the highest satisfaction. The first goal of our consultants and employees is to enhance quality of service, secure of life and treatment received by the medical profession. Together with the health professions we will create advanced new satisfactory future services based on this business confidence .

I thanks to having the confidence in us, perhaps, the most important decision you will make where to seek your health care.

MD. Zulfiquear Ali Babul
Managing Director
AMZ Hospital Ltd.

Quick Amenities in AMZ Hospital

Home Service

Amz Hospital is a medical home service provider that brings healthcare to your doorstep.

Diagnosis & Investigation

AMZ Hospital use a combination of these services to accurately diagnose a patient's condition and develop an appropriate treatment plan.

Hospital Services

AMZ hospital services are designed to provide comprehensive, high-quality medical care to patients in need.

AMZ Hospital is new Hospital established in Badda area with 24 hour emergency emergency service in a multi-storied building. They have some expert specialist doctors for consultation. They also have diagnostic service. They want to give a better medical sercice than any other hopitals. They have good security system. Now its time see their service equality.
Md. Firozur Rahman

AMZ Hospital is new Hospital established in Badda area with 24 hour emergency emergency service in a multi-storied building. They have some expert specialist doctors for consultation. They also have diagnostic service. They want to give a better medical sercice than any other hopitals. They have good security system. Now its time see their service equality.
Atif AhnafReview collect form Google Map
Read More
I am totally satisfied with their work . I was here for my sister . They took her to the emergency department and I was with her all the time . The environment is very clean and I have to praise the emergency doctor's behaviour and his handwriting. My father had arm pain . He told that emergency medical officer . They took his words seriously and prescribed him to go to the main doctor the even wrote a letter to the doctor so that he doesn't have to give a good check the emergency officer tested my father and my sister didn't have to wait . Believe me AMZ is one of the best hospitals I have visited . The cafeteria is completely clean so is the floor and their ambulance service is precise . The emergency officer and receptionist ate so polite that my father and my sis is completely pleased and the cost is low too . They have advance facilities that I didn't see in other hospitals . And I guess this hospital deserves 5 star . I am pleased .
